hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Daily Bollinger Band Squeeze Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: For high-volume altcoins (SOL, AVAX, DOGE), when daily Bollinger Band width (20,2) reaches its lowest 10th percentile over 90 days during a NEUTRAL/BULL regime, and price then moves >1.5σ from the 20-day SMA, a contrarian trade in the opposite direction will be profitable within 3-5 days as volatility expands and price reverts.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Bollinger Band squeezes often precede expansion. In neutral/bull regimes, an extreme move immediately after a squeeze tends to be overextended and snaps back as volatility normalizes.
entry_conditions: Altcoin (SOL/AVAX/DOGE) daily BB width ≤ 10th percentile (90-day lookback)
Price closes >1.5σ above upper BB OR <1.5σ below lower BB

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to within 0.5σ of 20-day SMA OR +5% profit (long)/-5% profit (short)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price moves another 1σ in the adverse direction

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Average 5-day return after entry is negative OR the initial breakout continues directionally >60% of the time.
